pkgmetadata.longdescription: Species-Habitat Associations // Analyse species-habitat associations in R. Therefore, information about the location of the species (as a point pattern) is needed together with environmental conditions (as a categorical raster). To test for significance habitat associations, one of the two components is randomized. Methods are mainly based on Plotkin et al. (2000) doi:10.1006/jtbi.2000.2158 and Harms et al. (2001) doi:10.1111/j.1365-2745.2001.00615.x.
